subtitle: chapter 34 materializing a palace in the
Himalayas
babaji's first meeting with Lara Masha
is an enthralling story and one of the
few which gave us a detailed glimpse of
the deathless guru these words were
Swami Kabul on des preamble to wonders
tale the first time here accounted it I
was literally spellbound on many other
occasions I coaxed my gentle Sanskrit
tutor to repeat the story which was
later told me and substantially the same
words by Sri Yukteswar both things
Lahari mahashiv disciples had heard the
awesome tale direct from the lips of
their guru my first meeting with Baba ji
took place in my 33rd year Lara Masha
had said in the autumn of 1861 I was
stationed in downup or as a government
accountant in the military engineering
department one morning the office
manager summoned me Larry said a
telegram has just come from our main
office you are to be transferred to Rana
ket where an Army post
has now been established with one
servant I sent out on the 500-mile trip
travelling by horse and buggy we arrived
in 30 days at the hem lane site of
Ranikhet my office duties were not
onerous I was able to spend many hours
roaming the Magnificent hills a rumor
reached me that great Saints blessed the
region with her presence
I felt the strong desire to see them
during the ramble one early afternoon I
was astounded to hear a distant voice
calling my name I continued my vigorous
upward climb of drun giri mountain a
slight uneasiness beset me at the
thought that I might not be able to
retrace my steps before darkness had
descended over the jungle I finally
reached a small clearing whose side was
Donald caves on one of the rocky ledges
took a smiling young man extending his
hand and welcomed I noticed with
astonishment that except first copper
colored hair he bore a remarkable
resemblance to myself Larry you have
come the Saint addressed me
affectionately in Hindu rest here in
this cave it was I who called you
I entered a neat little grotto which
contains several woolen blankets and a
few kama doulas begging bowls Larry do
you remember that seat the yogi pointed
to a folded blanket in one corner no sir
somewhat dazed the strangest of my
adventure I added I must leave now
before nightfall I have business in the
morning to my office
the mysterious Saint replied in English
the office was brought for you and not
you for the office I was dumbfounded
that this forest aesthetic could not
only speak English but also paraphrase
the word of Christ I see my telegram
took effect
the Yogi's remark was incomprehensible
to me I inquired his meaning I refer to
the kilogram that summoned you to these
isolated parts it was I who silently
suggested to the mind of your superior
officer that you be transferred to Rana
ket when one feels his unity with all
mankind all minds become transmitting
stations through which he can work at
will he added gently Larry surely this
cave seems familiar to you as I maintain
the build wildered silence the Saint
approached me and struck me gently on
the forehead at his magnetic touch a
wonderous current struck through my
brain releasing the sweet seed memories
of my previous life I remember my voice
was half choked with joyous sobs you are
my guru Baba ji who has belonged to me
always scenes of the past arise vividly
in my mind here in this cave I spent
many years of my last incarnation as
ineffable recollection overwhelming i
tearfully embraced my Master's feet for
more than three decades I have waited
for you here waited for you to return
babaji's voice rang with celestial love
you slipped away and vanished into the
mulcher waves of the life beyond death
the magic wand of your karma touched you
and you were gone though you lost sight
of me never did I lose sight of you I
pursued you over the luminescent astral
see where the glorious angels sail
through gloom storm up he
the light I followed you like a mother
bird guarding her young as you lived out
your human term of womb life and emerged
a babe my I was ever on you when you
covered your teeny form and the Lotus
posture under the Nadia's sands in your
childhood I was invisible and present
patiently month after month year after
year
I have watched over you waiting for this
perfect day now you are with me lo here
is your cave love lore I have kept it
ever clean and ready for you
here is your hollowed asana blanket
where you daily sit to fill your
expanding heart with God behold there
your bowl from which you often drink the
nectar prepared by me see how I have
kept the brass cup brightly polished
that you might drink again there from my
own do you now understand my guru what
can I say I murmured brokenly where has
one ever heard of such deathless love I
gazed long and ecstatically in my
eternal treasure my guru in life and
death Lahari you need purification drink
the oil in his bowl and lie down by the
river babaji's practical wisdom I
reflected with a quick worm innocent
smile was ever to be for I obeyed his
direction though the icy Himalayan night
was descending a comforting warmth an
inner radiation began to pulsate in
every cell of my body I marvelled was
the unknown oil in do with a cosmical
heart bitter winds whipped around me in
the darkness shrieking a fierce
challenge that chill wavelets of the go
gosh river lapped now and then over my
body outstretched on the rocky bank
Tigers how old nearby but my heart was
free of fear the radiant force newly
generated within me conveyed an
assurance of unassailable protection
several hours passed swiftly faded
memories of another life wove themselves
into the present brilliant pattern of
reunion with my divine guru my solitary
museums were interrupted by the sound of
approaching footsteps in the darkness a
man's hand gently helped
my feet and gave me some dry clothing
come brother my companion said the
master awaits you he led the way through
the forest the somber night was suddenly
lit by a steady luminosity and distance
can that be the sunrise I inquired
surely the whole night has not passed
the hour is midnight my guide laughed
softly yonder light is the glow of a
golden palace materialized here tonight
by the peerless babaji in the dim past
you once expressed a desire to enjoy the
beauties of a palace our master is now
satisfying your wish thus freeing you
from the bonds of karma he entered the
magnificent palace will be the scene of
your initiation tonight into Kriya yoga
all your brothers here join in a pan of
welcome rejoicing at the end of your
long exile behold a vast palace of
dazzling gold stood before us studded
with countless jewels and sediments
landscaped gardens it presented a
spectacle unparalleled grandeur saints
of angelic countenance were stationed by
resplendent gates half reddened by the
glitter of rubies diamonds pearls
sapphires and emeralds of great size and
luster were embedded in the decorative
arches I followed my companion into a
spacious reception hall the odor of
incense and of roses rafted through the
air dim lamps shed a multicolored glow
small groups of devotees some fair some
dark-skinned chanted musically or sat in
the meditative posture immersed in an
inner peace a vibrant joy pervaded the
atmosphere feast your eyes enjoyed the
artistic splendor of this palace for it
has been brought into being solely in
your honor my guide smiled
sympathetically as I added a few
ejaculations of wonderment brother I
said the beauty of this structure
surpasses the bounds of human
imagination please tell me the story of
its origin I will gladly enlighten you
my companions dark eyes sparkled with
wisdom in reality there is nothing
inexplicable about this materialization
the whole cosmos is a materialized
thought of the creator
this heavy earthly clod floating in
space is a dream of God he made all
things out of his consciousness even as
man in his dream consciousness
reproduces and vivifies a creation with
its creatures God first created the
earth as an idea then he quickened it
energy atoms come into being he
coordinated the atoms into the solid
sphere all its molecules are headed
together by the will of God when he
withdraws his will the earth again will
disintegrate into energy energy will
dissolve into consciousness the earth
idea will disappear from objectivity the
substance of a dream is held in
materialization by the subconscious
thought of the dreamer when that
cohesive thought is withdrawn and
wakefulness the dream and its elements
dissolve a man closes his eyes and he
wrecks a dream creation which on
awakening he effortlessly D materializes
he follows a divine archetypal pattern
similarily when he awakens into cosmic
consciousness he will effortlessly D
materialize the illusions of the cosmic
dream being one with the infinite
all-encompassing will Babaji can summon
the elemental elements to combine and
manifest themselves in any form this
Golden Palace instantaneously created
his real even as his earth is real
Babaji created this palatial mansion out
of his mind and it's holding its atom
together by the power of his will even
as God created this earth and is
maintaining it intact he added when his
structure has served its purpose Babaji
will dematerialize it as i remain silent
and oh my guide made a sweeping gesture
this shimmering palace superbly
embellished with jewels has not been
built by human effort or laborious ly
mined gold and gems it stands solidly a
monumental challenge to man whoever
realizes himself as a son of God even as
Babaji has done can reach any goal by
the infinite powers hidden within
a common stone locks within itself the
secret of stupendous atomic energy even
so
immortal as yet a powerhouse of divinity
the sage picked up from a nearby table a

with diamonds our great guru created
this palace by solidifying myriads of
free cosmic rays he went on touched his
vase in its diamonds they will satisfy
all the test of sensory experience I
examined the vase and passed my hand
over the smooth room walls thick with

scattered lavishly about was worthy of a
king's collection deep satisfaction
spread over my mind a submerged desire
hidden in my subconscious from lives now
gone seemed simultaneously gratified and

through ornate archers and corridors
into a series of chambers richly
furnished in the style of an Emperor's
Palace we entered in a man's Hall in the

of colors there and Lotus posture South
the supreme Babaji I knelt on the
shining floor at his feet
Lari are you still feasting on your
dream desire for golden palace my gurus
eyes were twinkling like his own
sapphires wake all your earthly thirst
are about to be quenched forever he
murmured some mystic words of blessing
my son arrives received your initiation
into the kingdom of God through Kriya
yoga Babaji stretched out his hand a
Houma sacrificial fire appeared

I received the liberating yogic
technique before this flaming altar the
rites were completed in the early dawn I
felt no need for sleep in my ecstatic
state and wandering around the palace
filled on all sides with treasures and
priceless objects of art descending to
the gorgeous gardens I noticed nearby
the same caves and barren mountain
legend which yesterday had boasted no
adjacency to palace or
Laur terrors re-entering the palace

surrounded by many quiet disciples
Lowrey you are hungry Babaji added close
your eyes when I reopen them the
enchanting Palace and its picturesque
garden too disappeared my own body in
the forms of Babaji in the cluster of
Chile's were all now seated on the bare
ground at the exact spot of the vanished
Palace not far from the sunlit entrance
of the rocky grottoes I recall as my
guide of remark that the palace would be
Dina materialized its captive atoms
released into the thought essence from
which that sprung although stunned
I looked trusting in my guru I knew not
what to expect next on his day of
miracles the purpose for which the
palace was created has now been served
Babaji explained he lifted an earthen
vessel from the ground put your hand
there and receive whatever food you
desire as soon as I touched the broad
empty bowl it became heap with
hot-buttered fraught Lucchese curry and
where sweetmeats I helped myself
observing that the vessel was overfilled
and at the end of my meal I looked
around for water
my guru pointed to the bowl before me lo
the food had vanished and the place was
water clears from a mountain stream few
mortals know that the kingdom of God
includes the kingdom of mundane
fulfillments Babaji observed the divine
realm extends to the earthly but the
latter being illusory cannot include the
essence of reality beloved guru last
night you demonstrated for me the link
of beauty in heaven and earth I smiled
at memories of vanished Palace surely no
simple yogi had ever received initiation
into the Agust
mysteries of spirit amid surroundings a
more impressive luxury I grazed
tranquility at the stark contrast of the
present scene the gaunt ground the sky
VIII roof the caves offering primitive
shelter all seemed a gracious natural
setting for the seraphic saint
around me i sat that afternoon on my
blanket Hallowed by association of past
life realizations my divine guru
approached and passed his hand over my
head I entered the nearby Kulpa Samadhi
state remaining unbroken Li in its bliss
for seven days crossing the successive
strata of self-knowledge I penetrated
the deathless realms of reality all
delusive limitation dropped away my soul
was fully established on the eternal
altar of the cosmic spirit on the eighth
day I fell at my gurus feet and implored
him to keep me always near him in the
sacred wilderness my son Babaji said
embracing me your role and his
incarnation must be played on an outward
stage prenatally blessed by many lives
on lonely meditation you must now mingle
in the world of men a deep purpose
underlined the fact that you not meet me
this time until you were already a
married man with modest business
responsibilities you must put aside your
thoughts of joining our secret band in
the Himalayas your life lies in the
crowded March serving as an example of
the ideal yogi householder the cries of
many bewildered worldly men and women
have not yet fallen unheard on the years
of the great when he went on you've been
chosen to bring spiritual solace through
Kriya yoga to numerous earnest seekers
the millions who've encumbered by family
ties and heavy world duties will take
new heart from you a householder like
themselves
you must guide them to see that the
highest yoga containments are not barred
to the family man even in the world the
yogi who faithfully discharges
responsibilities without personal motive
attachment treads the sure path of
enlightenment no necessity compels you
to leave the world for inwardly you have
already sundered it's every karmic tie
not of this world you must yet be in it
many years till remain during which you
must conscientiously fulfill your family
business civic and spiritual duties a
sweet new breath of divine hope will
penetrate the air and hearts of worldly
man
from your balance life they will
understand that liberation is dependent
on inner rather than outer renunciation
how remote seemed my family the office
the world as I listened to my guru in
the high Himalayan solitudes yet adamant

agreed to leave this blessed haven of
peace
Babaji instructed me in the ancient

bestow the Kriya ki only unqualified
chivas baba ji said he who vows to

angelic guru as you have already favored

the tortured men and women of the world

attempt the road to freedom of Korea
initiation be withheld from them be it
soul the divine wish has been expressed

who humbly ask for help after a silence

as I knelt the next morning my guru's

my deep reluctance to leave him there is

wherever you are whenever you call me I

I wondered my way down the mountain at

should return to Donna / office at read

as I turned the conversation to

one men said soothingly your mind has

Mountain airs this is some daydream

super sensual truth is deserved and

holy guru I realized my serious error I

Micra one of the group spoke reverently

the thought arose in my mind that the

astounded I fell on Babaji he was
